contentrichtext.text: {{In the news/image |image = Andy_Murray_ITN.jpg |size = 100x100px |title = Andy Murray at The Boodles, Stoke Park, June 2012 |link = Andy_Murray_ITN.jpg |border = yes |alt = Andy Murray }} {{*mp|July 7}} In tennis, '''[[Marion Bartoli]]''' wins the [[2013 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles|women's singles]] and '''[[Andy Murray]]''' ''(pictured)'' wins the [[2013 Wimbledon Championships – Men's Singles|men's singles]] at the [[2013 Wimbledon Championships|Wimbledon Championships]]. {{*mp|July 6}} '''[[Asiana Airlines Flight 214]]''' crashes while landing at [[San Francisco International Airport]], killing two people. {{*mp|July 6}} A runaway fuel train '''[[Lac-Mégantic derailment|derails]]''' in [[Lac-Mégantic, Quebec]], killing at least five people and destroying at least thirty buildings in the town's core. {{*mp|July 6}} At least 42 people, mostly students, are '''[[Yobe State school shooting|killed]]''' in a pre-dawn attack at a school in [[Yobe State]], Nigeria. {{*mp|July 4}} The '''[[London Array]]''', the world's largest [[Offshore wind power|offshore wind farm]], is inaugurated. {{*mp|July 3}} King '''[[Albert II of Belgium]]''' announces his intention to [[abdication|abdicate]] in favour of his son [[Prince Philippe, Duke of Brabant|Philippe]]. {{*mp|July 3}} '''[[2013 Aceh earthquake|An earthquake]]''' strikes [[Aceh]], Indonesia, killing at least 35 people. </ul> <!--'''{{#ifexist:Deaths in {{CURRENTYEAR}}|[[Deaths in {{CURRENTYEAR}}|Recent deaths]]|[[Deaths in {{#time:Y|-1 years}}|Recent deaths]]}}''': {{nowrap|NAME}}--> <!-- Please consider keeping ongoing news stories on ITN if the article keeps getting updated. --><div style="text-align: right;" class="noprint">'''{{#ifexist:Deaths in {{CURRENTYEAR}}|[[Deaths in {{CURRENTYEAR}}|Recent deaths]]|[[Deaths in {{#time:Y|-1 years}}|Recent deaths]]}}'''{{#if:{{{nocurrenteventslink|}}}|| – '''[[Portal:Current events|More current events...]]'''}}</div><noinclude> {{active editnotice}} {{documentation}} </noinclude>
